content: cocoa dreams knit fingerless mittens sizes child s-m l-xl skill level advanced beginner this fall elevate your knitting game with the **cocoa dreams knit fingerless mittens** a must-have accessory for those chilly autumn days designed for advanced beginners this project takes you through beautiful mosaic stitches and comfortable thumb gusset shaping giving you that ideal mitten fit while leaving your fingers and thumbs free with the support of a full video tutorial these mittens are within reach perfect for knitters with a touch of experience ready to take on double-pointed needles
